lanes.x-description: The lane is started when the input-trigger causes an internal trigger to be fired

segments.x-description: The segment lasts 0.5 seconds, so the gate will last 0.5 seconds

actions.x-description: Generate a random value between -5V and 5V that will determine which output to use
Also send the random value to output 3, from where when can visualize for debugging purposes
If the random value is greater than 0, set the first output to a high gate
If the random value is less than or equal to 0, set the second output to a high gate

segments.x-description: After the 0.5 seconds of the previous segment has passed, set the output gates to low (0V) again

input-triggers.x-description: Monitor input 1 for an input trigger that will activate our Bernoulli Gate logic through an internall trigger
